hero: We specialize in implementing innovative technologies and software developments that help well-known clients achieve success in the market. Bring on the global intelligence of business processes and today's IT trends that create products and services that redefine smarts and remain the core of competitive edge

services.title: Software development
services.text: Our team of professionals develops unique software solutions that meet your needs and contribute to the development of your business. We develop full-cycle software products for the realization of your business goals.

services.title: Marketing
services.text: We provide the widest range of marketing tools to grow your business. From social media marketing to a complete, comprehensive marketing strategy with a big budget. At the consultation, we will tell you what needs to be improved and how we can help you become better in business.

services.title: UI / UX Design
services.text: The process of developing UI/UX design for websites includes analyzing the target audience and their needs, creating ideas and design concepts, developing prototypes and testing them for user experience, as well as  defining the color palette, fonts, and other design elements.

services.title: Business forecasting
services.text: Our team of experts will thoroughly analyze your data, identify patterns and trends, based on which you can build accurate forecasts of future events. We will provide you with detailed market research, competitor analysis and consumer trends to help you adapt to changes in the environment.

services.title: Desktop Application Development
services.text: Desktop application development is the process of creating software to run on personal computers, which are installed and executed without internet access, and can have various functionalities ranging from processing text and tables to advanced graphical capabilities and use of databases.

services.title: Business consultations
services.text: If you have an idea and don't know how to implement it - we are waiting for your message. Sign up for a free consultation and get planning for the development of your business in digital and beyond. We will help you and make a project.

about_history: KiWiCode Solutions was founded by a group of enthusiasts united by a common passion for technology. Since then, we have been on the path from a startup to a respected IT company providing modern solutions for any business.
about_team: Our experts are our most valuable asset. Each member of our team has unique skills and experience that we are proud to use to achieve your goals. We always appreciate new people in the team and are happy to meet new people.
about_value: We believe that technology can change the world for the better. At KiWiCode Solutions, we strive to create products that not only improve business processes, but also make a positive difference in people's lives. We know how to help you develop your startup from an idea to a large-scale project that will change not only your life, but also the lives of those around you.

pinciples.title: Expertise and professionalism
pinciples.text: Our team consists of highly qualified professionals with many years of experience in their fields. We are always on the lookout for new technologies and innovations to provide the best solutions for our customers.

pinciples.title: Individual approach
pinciples.text: We understand that each business is unique, so we provide an individual approach to each project. We refine our solutions to meet your needs and goals.

pinciples.title: Meeting timelines
pinciples.text: We respect your time and do our best to complete projects on time and according to agreed deadlines.

pinciples.title: Partnership
pinciples.text: We don't see you as customers, we see you as partners. We strive to build long-term relationships based on mutual trust and cooperation.

how.title: Research and Design
how.text: At KiWiCode Solutions, our journey begins with in-depth research and design. We conduct thorough market analysis and gather insights into your project's goals and target audience. Our expert designers craft visually appealing and user-centric designs that set the foundation for a successful project.

how.title: Development
how.text: Once the design is approved, our skilled development team steps in. Using cutting-edge technologies, we transform designs into functional tech products. At KiWiCode Solutions, we specialize in creating custom solutions tailored to your specific needs, ensuring your project is unique and fully responsive.

how.title: Testing and Optimisation
how.text: Quality is our priority. In the testing and optimization phase, we perform extensive quality assurance to identify and resolve any issues, ensuring a seamless user experience. We also optimize performance, ensuring your project loads quickly and efficiently.

how.title: Launching the Project
how.text: KiWiCode Solutions ensures a smooth and secure project launch. We handle the technical aspects of deployment, making your project accessible to your audience. This is the exciting moment when your project goes live and becomes available to users.

how.title: Marketing and Promotion
how.text: Our services extend beyond development. We offer marketing and promotion strategies to maximize your project's visibility and success. With our expertise in online marketing, we'll help you attract and engage your target audience, driving traffic and increasing awareness of your project in a competitive digital landscape.

subtitle.portfolio: We present examples of work that has already been implemented by our team.
subtitle.team: Our team offers a full range of layout development services to testing the finished proposal.
subtitle.modal: More than 4+ ears of experience that helps build effective process.

tablet.title: Consultation
tablet.text: Get detailed consultation from manager and expert for your area

tablet.title: Define tasks
tablet.text: Define tasks, goals, business needs and project concept

tablet.title: Short overview
tablet.text: Short overview of KiWiCode Solution portfolio and best practice

tablet.title: Determine the scope
tablet.text: Determine the scope, boundaries of the project and expectations

response.name: Mohammad Faruque
response.text: Extremely satisfied with our collaboration with the IT startup! Their software development solutions impress with their quality and efficiency. They also handle marketing and UI/UX design tasks exceptionally professionally.

response.name: Jonathan Borba
response.text: The team has proven highly competent in business forecasting. We confidently recommend them as reliable partners for desktop application development and business consultancy.

response.name: Joseph Gonzalez
response.text: In a short time of cooperation, we've seen significant progress in our projects thanks to the professionalism of the IT startup. They know how to deliver results and perform at a high level.

response.name: Mubariz Mehdizadeh
response.text: Our team is impressed by the efficiency of the IT startup's work. They not only develop excellent software but also provide valuable insights into marketing and business strategies.

response.name: Joshua Rondeau
response.text: Big thanks for the assistance in developing our products! The IT startup has proven to be an excellent partner in all aspects, from programming to design and sales strategies.

response.name: Maria Mendes
response.text: A professional approach to work and excellent communication make the IT startup the best choice for our company. We are very satisfied with the results of our collaboration!.
